name: intel-baseline
description: this runs the server and various views required to run the Intel Skyline simulator

scripts.install: cd C:\Users\%username%\skyline\skyline\server && npm install && cd C:\Users\%username%\skyline\skyline\client && npm install && lineman clean build && mklink /D C:\Users\%username%\skyline\skyline\server\public C:\Users\%username%\skyline\skyline\client\generated

author: @ignacioj
